edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.server.Controllers

Class ClientNetworkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.server.Controllers.ClientNetworkController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientNetworkController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Clientconnect is a runnable object representing a connection between the server and a client it provides all functionality for transmitting data to clients and receiving incoming data from them
    Version:
    for CS56, Spring 2013
    Author:
    Joseph Colicchio, Adam Ehrlich
